data.description:
⭐ Play 136 hamster-approved puzzles across 60 levels in the full game! ⭐

Get the full game: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5556605911096889/

Hello! Welcome to TUBE Industries: a hamster owned and operated tube puzzle emporium! 

Prepare for a tube-based, puzzle-filled, HAM-PACKED adventure with our charismatic leader: The BOSS. Here at TUBE Industries we provide the puzzles and you provide… the brains. No shady business here!

This is only a demo, but the full game contains the following TUBE-Based Benefits:
• 60 levels across 3 themed floors: Hamster Hangout, Smart Home Slide & Bakery Blitz!
• Customize your hamster’s appearance!
• Classic and slide-based tube puzzles!
• Numerous Mini-Puzzles including our new hamster cannon!
• Chat with the BOSS and help him deal with important “business decisions”!
• Relaxed-pace gameplay with no time pressure.
• Supports seated, standing, or room scale play.

Your destination for Tube-Based entertainment awaits!

Sincerely,
The BOSS

changelog.change_log: Port to Open XR. Various bug fixes and improvements.

- Fixed issues with bakery walls. 
- Fixed a cake puzzle pan bug. 
- Various in game text improvements. 
- Updated visuals for slide remove.

- Fixed a tube unlock bug in Hamster Hangout 20.
- Fixed a cannon trigger pad bug in Hamster Hangout 20.
- Added a height adjustment reminder in the entrance tunnel.
- The boss can now auto initiate dialogue sequences.
- Added a tooltip and new dialogue about the turbo button.
The Boss has returned! He brings news about the future of the game.

We've added the lobby environment and made several improvements including:
- New Lobby environment 
   (still in progress)
- Removed hand tracking
- New 3D audio 
- Fixed random crashes
- Seamless elevator level loading
- Improved hamster AI and tube board 
- Locomotion improvements
Bug fixes and distance grab improvements.

We've implemented several new features and changes including:
- Distance Grab (tutorial available in elevator)
- Dropped objects no longer "poof"
- Turbo Button (located on the tube board, changes the hamster travel speed)
- Updates to the Button puzzle progression
- Quality of life updates to the Hamster Ball puzzle
- We are phasing out support for Hand Tracking. It will be removed in a future update.

Locomotion Update!

We've removed the old teleport system and added:
- Free Movement
- Free Teleporting
- Height Adjustment
- Snap Rotation
- New Settings Options

What's new in V0.1.1 of Tube Be Continued:
-Redesigned the Hamster Ball Puzzle.
-Minor updates to the Living Room floor.
-Minor bug fixes and stability improvements

What's new in V0.1.1 of Tube Be Continued:
-Redesigned the Hamster Ball Puzzle.
-Minor updates to the Living Room floor.
-Minor bug fixes and stability improvements
